H0.text: Tomorrow marks the 109th anniversary of which great American taking the reins of the presidency following the death of William McKinley. Woodrow Wilson

H1.text: Tomorrow marks the 109th anniversary of which great American taking the reins of the presidency following the death of William McKinley. Franklin D. Roosevelt

H2.text: Tomorrow marks the 109th anniversary of which great American taking the reins of the presidency following the death of William McKinley. Harry S. Truman

H3.text: Tomorrow marks the 109th anniversary of which great American taking the reins of the presidency following the death of William McKinley. T Ros

A4.text: Roosevelt was sworn in as the 26th president after McKinley's death

A5.text: Theodore Roosevelt took the oath of office as president after McKinley's death
